1392100.name: Automobilista 2 Premium Track Pack
1392100.description:
This pack includes the five original Premium Track DLCs plus a sixth bonus track, each of the five featuring laser-scanned versions of these legendary circuits in their modern form along with incredibly faitfhul recreations of several historical layouts:

  • Hockenheimring (Modern Circuit plus 1977, 1988 & 2001 versions).

  • Silverstone (Modern Circuit 1975, 1991 & 2001 versions).

  • Nurburgring(2020 GP, Veedol, Sprint, Nordschleife & 24h layouts, plus the Historical 1971 versions of the Nordschleife, Sudschleife & Gesamtstrecke)

  • Spa-Francorchamps (Modern Circuit plus 2020, 1971 & 1993 versions). 

  • Monza(Modern Circuit plus 1971 & 1991 versions). 

  • Barcelona-Catalunya (Modern Circuit)

Each circuit as well as their historical variants featuring with multiple layout variations as most popularly raced throughout their decades as staples in motorsports history.
1392100.supported_languages:
英语*, 葡萄牙语 - 巴西, 德语
*具有完全音频支持的语言
